paper.title: Failure Risk and the Cross-Section of Hedge Fund Returns
paper.abstract: Modeling a hedge fund's probability of failure with a dynamic logit regression, I find that the probability of a fund's failure has a significantly negative effect on the fund's future returns. A quintile portfolio with the highest failure probability underperforms a quintile portfolio with the lowest failure probability by 5% to 6% per year from 1997 to 2012. The results are robust to the definition of hedge fund failure and controlling for a large set of risk factors and fund characteristics. Moreover, the negative effect of failure probability on future fund returns is stronger for funds with weak share restrictions.

domain_result.justification: 该论文研究了对冲基金失败概率对其未来回报的影响，并构建了基于失败概率的投资组合，这直接涉及金融风险管理中的风险评估和投资组合管理中的资产配置策略。
